languages.text: Кто тот загадочный последний гость, которого ждут на церемонии? Это знание может стать ключом к пониманию происходящего.
Who is the mysterious final guest everyone is waiting for at the ceremony? The answer to that may be the key to understanding what is happening.
languages.original_text: Кто тот загадочный последний гость, которого ждут на церемонии? Это знание может стать ключом к пониманию происходящего.

traits.locale_text: Who is the mysterious final guest everyone is waiting for at the ceremony? The answer to that may be the key to understanding what is happening.
Who is the mysterious final guest everyone is waiting for at the ceremony? The answer to that may be the key to understanding what is happening.
Who is the mysterious final guest everyone is waiting for at the ceremony? The answer to that may be the key to understanding what is happening.
Who is the mysterious final guest everyone is waiting for at the ceremony? The answer to that may be the key to understanding what is happening.

languages.text: 所有人都在翘首以盼的神秘客人究竟是谁？如果能找到这个问题的答案，或许就能弄清这里发生了什么事情。
languages.original_text: Who is the mysterious final guest everyone is waiting for at the ceremony? The answer to that may be the key to understanding what is happening.

traits.locale_text: 所有人都在翘首以盼的神秘客人究竟是谁？如果能找到这个问题的答案，或许就能弄清这里发生了什么事情。

languages.text: 式典で皆が心待ちにしている謎の最後のゲストは誰なのか？その答えが、何が起きているのかを理解する上での鍵になるかもしれない。
languages.original_text: Who is the mysterious final guest everyone is waiting for at the ceremony? The answer to that may be the key to understanding what is happening.

traits.locale_text: 式典で皆が心待ちにしている謎の最後のゲストは誰なのか？その答えが、何が起きているのかを理解する上での鍵になるかもしれない。

languages.text: ¿Quién es el último invitado al que todos esperan para la ceremonia? Descubrirlo será clave para entender qué ocurre.
languages.original_text: Who is the mysterious final guest everyone is waiting for at the ceremony? The answer to that may be the key to understanding what is happening.

traits.locale_text: ¿Quién es el último invitado al que todos esperan para la ceremonia? Descubrirlo será clave para entender qué ocurre.

languages.text: Wer ist der geheimnisvolle letzte Gast, auf den alle Teilnehmer der Zeremonie warten? Die Antwort auf diese Frage erklärt möglicherweise, was hier vor sich geht.
languages.original_text: Who is the mysterious final guest everyone is waiting for at the ceremony? The answer to that may be the key to understanding what is happening.

traits.locale_text: Wer ist der geheimnisvolle letzte Gast, auf den alle Teilnehmer der Zeremonie warten? Die Antwort auf diese Frage erklärt möglicherweise, was hier vor sich geht.

languages.text: Qui est l'invité mystérieux que tout le monde attend à la cérémonie ? Répondre à cette question permettrait sans doute d'éclaircir toute l'affaire.
languages.original_text: Who is the mysterious final guest everyone is waiting for at the ceremony? The answer to that may be the key to understanding what is happening.

traits.locale_text: Qui est l'invité mystérieux que tout le monde attend à la cérémonie ? Répondre à cette question permettrait sans doute d'éclaircir toute l'affaire.

languages.text: Törendeki herkesin beklediği gizemli son konuk kim? Bu sorunun cevabı, neler olup bittiğini anlamanın anahtarı olabilir.
languages.original_text: Who is the mysterious final guest everyone is waiting for at the ceremony? The answer to that may be the key to understanding what is happening.

traits.locale_text: Seremonideki herkesin beklediği gizemli son konuk kim? Bu sorunun cevabı, neler olup bittiğini anlamak konusunda kilit önem taşıyor olabilir.
